column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<style type="text/css">

html {
 background: @@@import:pagebackcol@@@; 			/* default background colour */
 border: 0;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 height: 100%;
 max-height: 100%;
 /* \*/
 overflow: hidden;
 /* */
}

body {
 background: @@@import:pagebackcol@@@;			/* default background colour */
 border: 0;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 height: 100%;
 max-height: 100%;
 overflow: hidden;
}

#center {
 background: @@@import:centerbackcol@@@;			/* center background colour */
 color: @@@import:centertextcol@@@;			/* center text colour */
 padding-left: @@@import:leftwidth@@@;				/* left column width */
 padding-right: @@@import:rightwidth@@@;				/* right column width */
 display: block;
 position: relative;
 height: 100%;
 max-height: 100%;
 overflow: auto;
 z-index: 1;
 margin: 0 auto;
}

#left {
 background: @@@import:leftbackcol@@@;			/* left column background colour */
 color: @@@import:lefttextcol@@@;			/* left column text colour */
 width: @@@import:leftwidth@@@;				/* left column width */
 top: 0px;
 bottom: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
 position: absolute;
 left: 0px;
 overflow: visible;
 z-index: 3;
}

#right {
 background: @@@import:rightbackcol@@@;			/* right column background colour */
 color: @@@import:righttextcol@@@;			/* right column text colour */
 width: @@@import:rightwidth@@@;				/* right column width */
 top: 0px;
 bottom: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
 position: absolute;
 right: 18px;
 overflow: auto;
 z-index: 2;
}

.center_padding_bottom {
 height: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
}

#footer {
 background: @@@import:footerbackcol@@@;			/* footer background colour */
 color: @@@import:footertextcol@@@;			/* footer text colour */
 height: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
 position: absolute;
 bottom: -1px;
 right: 18px;
 margin: 0;
 width: 100%;
 z-index: 4;
}

.footer_padding {
 height: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
 float: left;
 width: 18px;
}

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
@@@title@@@

@@@content@@@
@@@menu.content@@@
@@@news.content@@@
@@@toolbar.content@@@
